actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XX of the Social Security Act to make certain that social security benefit increases do not have the effect of making any individual ineligible for services and related benefits under the program established by such title.

summary.text: Amends Title XX (Grants to States for Services) of the Social Security Act to exclude from an individual's income cost-of-living increases in social security benefits in determining eligibility for services and benefits under such title.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XX of the Social Security Act to make certain that social security benefit increases do not have the effect of making any individual ineligible for services and related benefits under the program established by such title.
